name: 1.5Dungeon
description:
Controls :

WASD / ZQSD / arrow keys to move

Get to the black triangle

Ouch, programming a viable control system for a triangular grid was waaaaaay harder than expected. I'm still pretty happy I managed to get the math down and have something playable even though it's just a single level. It's only missing the enemies and some level design (and fixing the colour palette mind you).

If I spend more time on this, I think it can become a pretty fun puzzle style game with enemies moving every time you move.

I don't know why, but it won't compile properly under Linux, I'll have another look tomorrow and hope to fix it in time.
